Artfully Designed Home Additions

Let the house you live in become the home you love!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Home-Addition-Service-2.jpg” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.7″ background_enable_color=”off” min_height=”565px” custom_margin=”41px||41px|||” hover_enabled=”0″]

Great designs. Better service.

Feeling cramped by a growing family? Need a new home office? Dreaming of a bigger kitchen, primary suite, or luxury bath? Life happens. If the home you bought is no longer the source of joy it once was, let’s talk.

Our designers, architects, project managers, and contractors work together — and with you — to help you uncover the potential of a home addition. We’ll get to know you, your family, and what you want to see in your home.

We take great pride in our home addition designs, but we’re even more proud of our service. Our clients appreciate our attention to detail, deep knowledge of design styles, and passion for creating classic, timeless, and functional homes.

We design it. We build it. You love it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials and Awards” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_image=”off” background_repeat=”repeat-y” background_blend=”soft-light” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”|10%||10%|false|true”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”70%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|auto||15%|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto||auto|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||auto|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

We hired Mosaik to do a home remodel and had the best experience! Scott and Erin were so wonderful to work with and really listened to our ideas. All of the sub-contractors were very pleasant and skilled at what they do.

– MARIANNE B.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_slider disabled_on=”on|on|off” module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|15%||auto|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Scott and Erin are professional and friendly and had so many fantastic ideas. The remodel was always on time, with no unexpected added costs. They transformed our home and we absolutely love the outcome.

– NANCY C.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Home-additions-service-1.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”46px||46px|||”]

Understanding design-build

Adding on to your home doesn’t have to be stressful or fraught with complication and frustration. What we do isn’t just remodeling and it isn’t just construction. It’s the perfect marriage of design and build.

We are a true one-stop shop. We do everything from conception to construction and beyond. Here at Mosaik Design & Remodeling, the success of our home addition projects relies on our dedication to:

Preparation – Our designers, architects, and builders work closely together as one seamless unit. There’s no confusion and we eliminate the hassles traditionally associated with adding on to your home.

Communication – You’ll never be left alone in the dark. We’ll talk to you throughout your project to provide status updates, get your feedback, and answer your questions.

Execution – Our teams of contractors work quickly and efficiently to minimize the disruption to your family’s life.

That’s design-build.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ Thoughtful, stylish, and modern interior design

From the very beginning, you’ll work with an interior designer who will help select furnishings, appliances, artwork, accents, colors, paints, and everything else needed to bring your home addition to life. We pay close attention to every detail and work hard to make your home addition look like it was there the whole time.

LEARN MORE

excerpt.rendered: Artfully Designed Home Additions Let the house you live in become the home you love!Great designs. Better service. Feeling cramped by a growing family? Need a new home office? Dreaming of a bigger kitchen, primary suite, or luxury bath? Life happens. If the home you bought is no longer the source of joy it once […]
